text: Badgers Rock is a small barren rock within the Merrimack River, in Salisbury, Massachusetts, United States. The rock is just south of the light campground area of the Salisbury Beach State Reservation and north of Plum Island Point on Plum Island in Newburyport.See the Geographic Names Information System (GNIS) record #613629 of the US Geological Survey (USGS) for additional info and maps. ==References== Category:River islands of Massachusetts Category:Islands of Essex County, Massachusetts Category:Salisbury, Massachusetts
title: Badgers Rock
